detectors.description:
Steaua.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#37-46) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#39)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#40)
detectors.markdown:
[Steaua.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#L37-L46) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [balances[msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#L39)
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#L40)

detectors.description:
Steaua.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#48-63) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- (balances[to] * 10) <= balances[from] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#49)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#53)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#54)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#55)
detectors.markdown:
[Steaua.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#L48-L63) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [(balances[to] * 10) <= balances[from]](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#L49)
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#L53)
	- [balances[from] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#L54)
	- [allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#L55)

detectors.description:
Steaua.smartfastConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#14-86) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 3100000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#16)

[Steaua.smartfastConstructorVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#L14-L86) uses literals with too many digits:

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Steaua.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#23-25)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#4)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#5)
	- Steaua.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#29-31)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Steaua.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#33-35)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#6)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#8)
	- Steaua.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#69-73)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#9)
	- Steaua.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Steaua.sol#37-46)
